import React from "react"; import "./CampaignCard.css"; import { ethers } from "ethers"; const SingleCard = (props) => { const GetBalance = async () => { const provider = new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum); const balance = await provider.getBalance(props.wallet); const balanceInEth = ethers.utils.formatEther(balance); console.log(balanceInEth); }; return (

{props.ngo}

{props.email}

{props.phone}

{" "} Mission :

{props.objective}

{" "} Minimum Acceptable Donation :

{props.minimum} ETH

{" "} Target Amount :

{props.target} ETH

{" "} MetaMask Wallet Address :

{props.wallet}
); }; export default SingleCard;
